verses.verse: “Sovereignty and awe belong to God who has established peace in his realm on high.
How can anyone number his forces?[b] Upon whom does his light not arise?
“How then can any man be righteous in God’s eyes? How can one born of woman be regarded as virtuous?
If in his eyes the moon is not bright and the stars are not pure,
how much less is man, who is a maggot, a son of man, who is a worm?”
